readable.title: 848180689_d67a1361ce
readable.content: A girl and a woman playing with a ball in a pool . a woman and a little girl are playing with a ball in the pool underneath some water chutes . a young girl and a woman play volleyball with a beach ball . The mother and daughter are batting a ball in the air to each other at the water park . Two girls in a pool , one catching a ball the other has thrown .
